name: Where am I ? (Mayur Games)
description:
This is a really intreseting maze game

You have small medium and big sizes for maze depending on which type of maze you play in 

W,A,S,D or Arrow keys to move

esc to pause and 

R to restart

The mouse doesn't get hidden in the browser version for some reason but if you download the windows version it doesn't happen

Enjoy and find your way!!

Thanks for Playing
